directions: Blend mango chunks, basil, lime juice, cayenne pepper, and salt in a blender until smooth; pour into a large bowl. Stir sugar into mango mixture until sugar dissolves. Fold diced mango into mixture. Pour into freezer pop molds.
ingredients: 3 mangos - peeled, seeded, and cut into chunks
title: Spicy Mango-Basil Paletas
